middle.bigIntro1: Hello, I started programming five years ago for money (I'm a greedy boy), but grew to enjoy it as well and now spend a lot of my free time on it. So win, win!
middle.bigIntro2: My greatest strengths focus on all things front-end and database related. However, I have ample experience with the backend as well. In my free time, I also like programming and reading novels, and I do try to write them myself. I hope to earn money through programming, so I can write in my free time.
middle.bigIntro3: Read further for details on my education and experience, as well as to see my projects!
middle.educationExplanation: I graduated Vidzeme Technology and Design Vocational school and earned a professional qualification as a Computer Software Engineering
middle.experienceExplanation1: For half-a-year I worked for the company SIA 'ETEKOS' where I made both the full front-end and some backend for multiple websites
middle.experienceExplanation2: Front-end: HTML, Javascript (+Typescript and React.js) and CSS (+SASS and Tailwind CSS)
middle.experienceExplanation3: Back-end: PHP, along with Mongo.db, MySQL on phpMyAdmin
middle.experienceExplanation4: My personal projects and their code are available to view on Github. (See in the Contact section)
middle.project1Explanation: A solo project webpage created just for the design using React, javascript and Tailwind CSS. I was provided with a sample and perfectly recreated it, animations and all.
middle.project2Explanation: A solo project website composed of five different lists, a .pdf reader and user accounts, made using a full front-end with javascript and animations, and PHP backend alongside a SQL database.
middle.project3Explanation: A team project made with two others, where we added to a provided webpage the ability to pull search results for other websites from an api, using only that webpage's link.
middle.project4Explanation: Made for fun with javascript and simple css. A true, undisputable masterpiece.
middle.project5Explanation: A react webpage made with typescript and scss where I place all of my small react projects.
